Southwest Center
Walking Directions

From the Marriott hotel to the Math Department and PAS

Leaving the front of the hotel take Second Street east (straight ahead) to Park Street. Turn right (south) on Park and walk about three blocks until you pass Fourth Street. The Park Center Student Union will be on your right and on the left is a pedestrian area between the Franklin and Life Sciences South buildings. Turn left into the pedestrian area. The Mathematics building is the seven story tower straight ahead about 200 yards. PAS is the three story building on the left, just north and west of the Math building. The lecture hall PAS 201 is on the west end of the building.

From the Sheraton hotel to the Math Department and PAS

Leaving the front of the hotel turn left and walk about 100 feet to the intersection of Speedway and Campbell. Turn left (south) on Campbell and walk to Third Street. Cross Campbell onto campus and go straight (west) along “the mall” for about 1/2 mile until you are near Old Main. Then turn left and make your way south, following the bike path. Eventually you will be in front of the Math bulding, a seven story tower. PAS is on your right, just north and west of the Math building. The lecture hall PAS 201 is on the west end of the building.

The University and the Marriott and Sheraton Hotels

GPS Coordinates

We're told (no extra credit for guessing by whom) that the coordinates of PAS 201 are:

North 32 degrees 13.795 minutes
West 110 degrees 57.296 minutes
